song.title: Forever (Give Thanks to the Lord)
song.lyrics:
[1] .A Give thanks to the Lord our God and King . His love endures forever .D For He is good, He is above all things . A His love endures forever . E D Sing praise, sing praise
[P] . E D Sing praise, sing praise || . E D Sing praise, sing praise
[C] .A Forever God is faithful .F#m7 Forever God is strong .E D A Forever God is with us, forever ---
[2] With a mighty hand and outstretched arm His love endures forever For the life that's been reborn His love endures forever
[3] From the rising to the setting sun His love endures forever By the grace of God we will carry on His love endures forever
[t] .A His Love endures forever
song.presentation: 1 2 P C 3 P C T C
